price: Shin, ba su Iura ba da abin da Allah Ya halitta kõ mene ne inuwõyinsu suna karkata daga dãma da wajãjen hagu, suna masu sujada ga Allah, alhãli suna masu ƙasƙantar da kai?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٖ يَتَفَيَّؤُاْ ظِلَٰلُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَٱلشَّمَآئِلِ سُجَّدٗا لِّلَّهِ وَهُمۡ دَٰخِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā mā khalaqa al-lahu min shayin yatafayya-u ẓilāluhu ʿani al-yamīni wal-shamāili sujjadan lillahi wahum dākhirūna
